name: CHAINSAW DONG
description:
Made in a week for #onebuttonjam (https://itch.io/jam/one-button-to-rule-all-jam)

Shoot your golden chainsaw dong at your sworn enemy (or AI) in this traditional mayan game!

If you're attached to your chainsaw, hold your button to charge and shoot it. Otherwise, press the button to jump and walljump.

If you want to switch between single player and multiplayer mode, you have to refresh the page (this is due to the inherent limitation of one button games).
